embed.title: ðŸ‘¥ Apply for a Team Position!
embed.description:
- Submit your application using the provided dropdown to apply for a team position.
- Applications will be reviewed based on experience, relevance to the role, and how well candidates align with our community values.
- Make sure to proofread your application before submission and provide accurate information.
- You will receive a direct message regarding the status of your application.

If you have any questions about the role or the application process, please reach out to a staff member.
